name: Lively Paint
description:
This game was made for the 55th episode of Trijam: The 3 hour game jam. The theme is Fun In A Blank Room. It probably took me more than 3 hours to make this, though I don't know for sure because I forgot to pause the timer during a longer break.

You can use your mouse to paint rather large pixels on a blank canvas. To do this, click the left button to place a pixel where indicated or hold it down and move the mouse around to keep painting. Use your mouse wheel or left/right arrow keys to cycle through the possible colours. The active colour is indicated by the cross hair thingy. There are not many, though each colour does something different. Play around and find out what the colours do and how they interact with another!

I wanted to include some music, but in the end I just barely was able to meet the deadline, so please play one of your favourite relaxing tunes while you create your painting and watch it becoming alive!

Licences
